syslog1.host_comment: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.
syslog1.port_comment: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port(514/UDP).
syslog1.protocol_comment: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, unix, unix-connect, etc).
syslog1.path_comment: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
syslog1.localhost_comment: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
syslog1.sysLogType_comment: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD).
syslog1.app_name_comment: The name of the application (Default: process.title).
syslog1.eol_comment: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Message without modifications).
